i18n.title: Assign Default Values for Object Properties
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function that assigns default values for object properties. This function helps streamline the process of ensuring that all properties in an object have a value, even if they were originally undefined. By using the Object.assign() method and spread syntax, we can easily create a new object with default values while maintaining the original key order.

meta.title: Assign Default Object Properties | JavaScript Tutorials
meta.description: Explore a JavaScript function that assigns default values for object properties, streamlining the process of ensuring all properties have a value.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Object, Default Values, Object.assign, Spread Syntax

steps.title: Assign Default Values for Object Properties

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 为对象属性设置默认值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨一个为对象属性分配默认值的JavaScript函数。此函数有助于简化确保对象中所有属性都有值的过程，即使这些属性最初是未定义的。通过使用Object.assign()方法和展开语法，我们可以轻松创建一个具有默认值的新对象，同时保持原始的键顺序。

meta.title: 设置对象默认属性 | JavaScript教程
meta.description: 探索一个为对象属性设置默认值的JavaScript函数，简化确保所有属性都有值的过程。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 对象, 默认值, Object.assign, 展开语法

steps.title: 为对象属性设置默认值
